items: Start in a push-up position with your hands shoulder-width apart and your feet together.
Slowly shift your weight forward until your shoulders are over your hands.
Engage your core and lift your feet off the ground, keeping your legs straight and together.
Lower your hips and lift your legs until your body is parallel to the ground.
Hold this position for as long as you can, aiming for 10-15 seconds to start.
Lower your legs back down to the ground and return to the starting push-up position.
Repeat for 3-5 sets, gradually increasing the amount of time you hold the planche position.
Increases upper body strength, particularly in the shoulders, chest, and triceps
Can be modified to suit different fitness levels and abilities
